faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our nursing services in Pune

questions.question: How quickly can you arrange nursing care in Pune?
questions.answer: We can arrange standard nursing care within 24-48 hours throughout Pune city. For emergency situations, we offer expedited services and can often provide care within a few hours depending on location and specific needs.

questions.question: Are your nurses licensed and insured?
questions.answer: Yes, all our nursing professionals are fully licensed according to Indian Nursing Council standards, insured, and have undergone thorough background checks. We only hire experienced professionals with proper credentials and regular training.

questions.question: Do you provide services in all areas of Pune?
questions.answer: Yes, we serve all areas within Pune city and surrounding suburbs including Uttamnagar , Warje Malwadi, Karvenagar , Kothrud and Deccan. We also provide services in nearby areas within Maharashtra.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept multiple payment methods including credit/debit cards, UPI, net banking, and cash. We also work with health insurance providers and can help with insurance claim processes for eligible services.

questions.question: Can I change my nurse if I'm not satisfied?
questions.answer: Absolutely. We prioritize the comfort and satisfaction of our patients. If you're not completely satisfied with your assigned nurse, simply contact our Pune office and we'll arrange a replacement as quickly as possible.

emergency.title: Need Emergency Care?
emergency.description: Our 24/7 emergency support line is always ready to assist you with urgent healthcare needs anywhere in Pune.
